LanguageData.GuardianNanites.label: guardian nanites
LanguageData.GuardianNanites.description: A colony of self-sufficient nanites which make the carrier body immune to pathogenic bacterias such as malaria, plague and flu.
LanguageData.ImmunityNanites.label: immunity boost nanites
LanguageData.ImmunityNanites.description: A colony of self-sufficient nanites which strengthen carrier's immunity.
LanguageData.EnviromentalNanites.label: enviromental protection nanites
LanguageData.EnviromentalNanites.description: A colony of self-sufficient nanites that covers carrier's skin reducing influence of aggressive environments.
LanguageData.EnviromentalNanites.stages.0.label: 15% protection
LanguageData.AvaliLifeExtensionNanites.label: Avali life extension nanites
